## Release {{VERSION}}

### Highlights
- First polished dashboard card release for Local Weather Forecast.
- Better startup resilience for unavailable entities.
- Improved language label mapping.

### What changed
- New custom card layout and visual styling.
- Improved compatibility with integration sensor attributes.

### Upgrade notes
- Clear browser cache after updating the card.
